elements.name: As a tester, I want to add new recipients and tag some of them as favorites so that I can keep a list of recipients (From Card transfer page)

steps.name: I'm on Getgo Fund transfer page
Add a recipient and tag it as a favorite
I Choose Manage Recipients option again
Recipient should be displayed in my favourites
